initializeCommand: mkdir arm-none-eabi && cd arm-none-eabi && wget https://developer.arm.com/-/media/Files/downloads/gnu/12.3.rel1/binrel/arm-gnu-toolchain-12.3.rel1-x86_64-arm-none-eabi.tar.xz && tar xvf arm-gnu-toolchain-12.3.rel1-x86_64-arm-none-eabi.tar.xz && sudo rm -f /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-gcc  && sudo rm -f /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-g++ && sudo rm -f /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-gdb && sudo rm -f /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-size && sudo rm -f /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-objcopy && sudo rm -f /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-objdump && sudo ln -s /workspaces/open_flashloader_template/arm-none-eabi/arm-gnu-toolchain-12.3.rel1-x86_64-arm-none-eabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-gcc /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-gcc && sudo ln -s /workspaces/open_flashloader_template/arm-none-eabi/arm-gnu-toolchain-12.3.rel1-x86_64-arm-none-eabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-g++ /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-g++ && sudo ln -s /workspaces/open_flashloader_template/arm-none-eabi/arm-gnu-toolchain-12.3.rel1-x86_64-arm-none-eabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-gdb /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-gdb && sudo ln -s /workspaces/open_flashloader_template/arm-none-eabi/arm-gnu-toolchain-12.3.rel1-x86_64-arm-none-eabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-size /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-size && sudo ln -s /workspaces/open_flashloader_template/arm-none-eabi/arm-gnu-toolchain-12.3.rel1-x86_64-arm-none-eabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-objcopy /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-objcopy && sudo ln -s /workspaces/open_flashloader_template/arm-none-eabi/arm-gnu-toolchain-12.3.rel1-x86_64-arm-none-eabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-objdump /usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-objdump
